lines: Tũtongorie o ta Mũrĩithi, Jesũ tũmenyerere.
Jesũ witũ, Jesũ witũ, Nĩwe watũgũrire,
Jesũ witũ, Jesũ witũ, Nĩwe watũgũrire,
Rĩu tuĩka mũrata witũ, Na ũtũtongoragie,
Jesũ witũ, Jesũ witũ, Rĩu tũthikĩrĩrie,
Jesũ witũ, Jesũ witũ, Rĩu tũthikĩrĩrie.
Nĩugĩte tũũke kũrĩ we, O na tũrĩĩ ehia mũno,
Tha ciaku nĩigũtuohora nga, Tũtherie twamũkĩre.
